meanings.definition: The quality or state of being malty.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the rich maltinesses in my favorite beer.
meanings.sent2: The maltinesses of the bread gave it a delicious flavor.
meanings.sent3: The maltinesses of the cereal made it taste like a cozy morning.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a maltinesses that warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The maltinesses of the chocolate cake made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: The flavor or aroma characteristic of malt.
meanings.sent1: The maltinesses in the air reminded me of brewing beer.
meanings.sent2: The maltinesses of the whiskey lingered on my palate.
meanings.sent3: The maltinesses of the cookies filled the kitchen with a comforting scent.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a deep maltinesses that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The maltinesses of the roasted coffee beans woke me up instantly.
